author: Master_Wu
title: A great way to learn techniques
review:
Anybody who is interesting in making their own Lego creations should love this book!

For a long time I've been interested in building my own creations but wasn't particularly good at it. when I was reading through this book, I found it was a fantastic way of learning new ways to building new things! It shows all the techniques you need to know to build simple, or a little more complicated! 

I highly recommend this book because I've learned so much from it, and I think you will too!
